form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT RE ASSETS AND LIABILITIES TO BE SUBMITTED BY EVERY REFUGEE 17 YEARS OF AGE OR OVER APPLYING FOR PAROLE INTO THE UNITED STATES, G-648 ( (2-275)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 1 296 599 AFFIDAVIT RE ASSETS AND LIABILITIES TO BE SUBMITTED BY EVERY REFUGEE 17 YEARS OF AGE OR OVER APPLYING FOR PAROLE INTO THE UNITED STATES I, being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I have on deposit in banks in the United States and in other countries the following: Location Name of Bank Amount 2. 1 have stocks and bonds in the United States and in other countries in the amount of $ market value as follows: Company/Government Unit No. of Shares or Bonds Value 3. I own real estate in the United States and in other countries as follows: Location Value Mortgages and other encumbrances thereon amounting to 4. I have in currency, gold, silver, diamonds, commodities, objects d'art in the United States and in other countries as follows: Value Location Item 5. I have the following assets in real and personal property in the United States and in other countries, not listed above as follows: Value Location Item 6. My total net worth is as follows: $ (Complete and true Signature of Applicant) Subscribed and sworn to before me by the above-named applicant at on (month/day/year) Name of Interpreter (Print) Signature of Interpreter (Signature and Title of Officer) (Reverse of this form may be used if additional space is needed) Form G-648 (6-2-75) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service
